text: Xeꞌkitaq bꞌik e jujun kitijoxelabꞌ e kachiꞌl ri herodianos,22:16 Ri winaq ri kitoꞌom ri Herodes xuqujeꞌ ri e ralkꞌwaꞌl are kakaj ketaqan pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Israel, are kꞌu ri kiwinaq ri e fariseos man kakaj taj. xeꞌkibꞌij che ri Jesús: Ajtij, qetaꞌm chi lal jun achi tzꞌaqat, xuqujeꞌ saq kabꞌan la chukꞌutik ri ubꞌe ri Dios man are ta kabꞌan la ri kakibꞌij ri winaq, rumal cher man are ta kil la ri kekaꞌy ri winaq.
